verses.name: Luke 9:33
verses.text: And it came to pass, as they departed from him, Peter said unto Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias: not knowing what he said.

verses.name: Luke 9:34
verses.text: While he thus spake, there came a cloud, and overshadowed them: and they feared as they entered into the cloud.

verses.name: Luke 9:35
verses.text: And there came a voice out of the cloud, saying, This is my beloved Son: hear him.
